casebody.data:
The People of the State of Illinois, Plaintiff-Appellee, v. Ebb Spriggs, Jr., Defendant-Appellant.(No. 59179;First District (2nd Division)April 9, 1974.

DOWNING, J., took no part.

James J. Doherty, Public Defender, of Chicago (William Lebovitz and Bernard L. Schwartz, Assistant Public Defenders, of counsel), for appellant.Bernard Carey, State’s Attorney, of Chicago (Kenneth L. Gillis and Linda West Conley, Assistant State’s Attorneys, of counsel), for the People. PER CURIAM.
